text:
<@U011UH5NZM4> Did you find the cause for this?
was it just the serverless.json

I am having a similar issue to the above, we have a number of serverless functions which have until now been working fine, I have just added a new one and it is not working
We get the error
`The endpoint POST managedeals has not been configured for portal xxx`
Can you DM a link to the config file?
